name: The Forbidden Chant
description:
Once there were enchanters who could invoke the power of world.They called the process of invocation chant, and the manifestation of power as spell.The power of spells were huge, and it could move mountains and reclaim the sea to change time and space, but every time it was used, it would leave a unhealable scar to the world. The stronger the spell is, the deeper the scar will be. But it did not stop any of the enchanters from pursuing the supreme power.

However, when all the legendary enchanters came to the end of the path, they found that they did not make it because there were too many enchanters that split the world power, the world can and can only accommodate one supreme enchanter. Even though they had lived together for a thousand years. In order to witness the peak of power, they began to kill each other.

In the end of the battle, only the strongest ones stayed alive. Now they are going to make the last fight to decide who will see the supreme power with his own eyes.
